data.name: Century - Zealot Pack
data.detailed_description:
Bring out the fear in the eyes of your enemies with the Zealot Pack - an ultimate set dedicated to worshippers in need of extra style and experience!

This pack includes all the content of the Fellow Pack DLC with extra rewards!

Full content of this DLC:
- An Epic Dragon Skin for the Windguard
- An Epic Dragon Skin for the Marauder
- 2,000 Gems
- A full epic outfit for the Phantom
- A Legendary helmet for the Windguard
- A Legendary helmet for the Marauder
- An Epic weapon for the Windguard
- An Epic weapon for the Marauder
- A 14-day xp booster
- 2 banners, player titles, profile wallpapers and player icons

Please be cautious!! Purchasing this pack will prevent you from acquiring the contents of another DLC pack.
This pack is not eligible for a refund.

data.short_description: Bring out the fear in the eyes of your enemies with the Zealot Pack - an ultimate set dedicated to Phantom worshippers in need of extra style and experience!
data.supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, French, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6Ghz or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 or AMD RX 560
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.8Ghz or AMD Ryzen 5 3.2Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
